user_query: I'm curious about the stock market and currency exchange rates. Can you fetch me the stock history of Google on February 1, 2023? Also, provide me with the average exchange rate of Tunisian Dinar against USD and EUR. Additionally, give me the equivalent words for the number 98765432.10 in English.

TaskList.description: Fetch the stock history of Google on February 1, 2023.
Get the average exchange rate of the Tunisian Dinar against USD and EUR.
Convert the number 98765432.10 into its equivalent words in English.
